StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateStatus]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SSN as varchar(9) AS
SELECT TOP 1 N.NWA_ID, P.PERSON_ID, S.STATUS_CODE, S.DISPOSITION_CODE FROM dbo.PERSON AS P WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN dbo.NWA AS N ON P.PERSON_ID = N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS AS S ON N.NWA_ID = S.NWA_ID WHERE (P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @SSN) AND (S.STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE) AS Expr1 FROM dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE (NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID))) AND (S.DISPOSITION_CODE = (SELECT MAX(DISPOSITION_CODE) AS Expr1 FROM dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS AS CS WHERE (N.NWA_ID = NWA_ID) AND (STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(STATUS_EFFECTIVE_DATE) AS Expr1 FROM dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS AS CS WHERE (N.NWA_ID = NWA_ID))))) ORDER BY N.NWA_ID DESC
